entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
